com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class AbstractScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MesosEventClient
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultScheduler, UninstallScheduler

    public abstract class AbstractScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements MesosEventClient
    Abstract main scheduler class that ties together the main pieces of a Service.

      • getClientStatus

        public MesosEventClient.ClientStatusResponse getClientStatus()
        Description copied from interface: MesosEventClient
        Called periodically to check the client status. These responses are generally used to tell upstream something about the state of the client, and/or telling upstream to do something.
        Specified by:
        getClientStatus in interface MesosEventClient

      • offers

        public MesosEventClient.OfferResponse offers(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> offers)
        Description copied from interface: MesosEventClient
        Called when the framework has received offers from Mesos. The provided list may be empty.
        Specified by:
        offers in interface MesosEventClient
        Parameters:
        offers - A list of offers which may be used in offer evaluation
        Returns:
        The response containing a list of operations to be performed against the offers, as well as a list of offers which were left unused. See MesosEventClient.OfferResponse

        Description copied from interface: MesosEventClient

        Specified by:
        taskStatus in interface MesosEventClient
        Parameters:
        status - The status message describing the new state of a task
        Returns:
        The response which describes whether the status was successfully processed

      • processOffers

        protected abstract MesosEventClient.OfferResponse processOffers(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> offers,
                                                                java.util.Collection<Step> steps)
        Invoked when Mesos has provided offers to be evaluated.
        Parameters:
        offers - zero or more offers (zero may periodically be passed to 'turn the crank' on other processing)
        steps - candidate steps which had been returned by the PlanCoordinator

      • processStatusUpdate

        protected abstract void processStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Invoked when Mesos has provided a task status to be processed.
        Parameters:
        status - the task status, which may be for a task which no longer exists or is otherwise unrelated to the service
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
